meanings.sent1: The clock on the wall was clicking loudly.
meanings.sent2: I heard the clicking of heels on the pavement.
meanings.sent3: The clicking of the old typewriter made me feel nostalgic.
meanings.sent4: The clicking of the door latch signaled someone's arrival.
meanings.sent5: The clicking of the light switch echoed in the empty room.

meanings.definition: Press a button on a computer mouse or keyboard.
meanings.sent1: She was clicking the mouse to open a new tab.
meanings.sent2: I need to click the 'send' button to submit the form.
meanings.sent3: He kept clicking the keyboard keys in frustration.
meanings.sent4: The students were clicking away on their laptops during the lecture.
meanings.sent5: Clicking the mouse quickly, she navigated through the website.

meanings.definition: To become suddenly clear or understandable.
meanings.sent1: After reading the explanation, everything started clicking into place.
meanings.sent2: The solution finally clicked in my mind after hours of thinking.
meanings.sent3: It all clicked for me when I saw the diagram.
meanings.sent4: The concept clicked like a light bulb turning on in my head.
meanings.sent5: The instructions clicked for her once she tried it herself.
